verses.verse: Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from my enemies <S%H341><s%>, O my God <S%H430><s%>: defend <S%H7682><s%> me from them that rise up against me <S%H6965><s%>.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>, and save <S%H3467><s%> me from bloody <S%H1818><s%> men <S%H582><s%>.

For <S%H693><s%>, behold, they lie in wait for my soul <S%H5315><s%>: the mighty <S%H5794><s%> are gathered <S%H1481><s%> against me <S%H6588><s%>; not for my transgression, nor for my sin <S%H2403><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
They run <S%H7323><s%> and prepare <S%H3559><s%> themselves without me being at fault <S%H5771><s%>: awake <S%H5782><s%> to help <S%H7125><s%> me <S%H7200><s%>, and behold.

You therefore <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, awake <S%H6974><s%> to visit <S%H6485><s%> all the heathen <S%H1471><s%>: be not merciful <S%H2603><s%> to any wicked <S%H205><s%> transgressors <S%H898><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
They return <S%H7725><s%> at evening <S%H6153><s%>: they make a noise <S%H1993><s%> like a dog <S%H3611><s%>, and go round about <S%H5437><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>.
Behold <S%H5042><s%>, they belch out with their mouth <S%H6310><s%>: swords <S%H2719><s%> are in their lips <S%H8193><s%>: for who <S%H8085><s%>, say they, does hear?
But you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, shall laugh <S%H7832><s%> at them <S%H1471><s%>; you shall have all the heathen in derision <S%H3932><s%>.
Because of his strength <S%H5797><s%> will I wait <S%H8104><s%> upon you <S%H430><s%>: for God is my defense <S%H4869><s%>.
The God <S%H430><s%> of my mercy <S%H2617><s%> shall prevent <S%H6923><s%> me <S%H430><s%>: God shall let me see <S%H7200><s%> my desire upon my enemies <S%H8324><s%>.

Kill <S%H2026><s%> them not <S%H5971><s%>, lest my people forget <S%H7911><s%>: scatter <S%H5128><s%> them by your power <S%H2428><s%>; and bring them down <S%H3381><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%> our shield <S%H4043><s%>.

For the sin <S%H2403><s%> of their mouth <S%H6310><s%> and the words <S%H1697><s%> of their lips <S%H8193><s%> let them even be taken <S%H3920><s%> in their pride <S%H1347><s%>: and for cursing <S%H423><s%> and lying <S%H3585><s%> which they speak <S%H5608><s%>.

Consume <S%H3615><s%> them in wrath <S%H2534><s%>, consume <S%H3615><s%> them <S%H3045><s%>, that they may not be: and let them know that God <S%H430><s%> rules <S%H4910><s%> in Jacob <S%H3290><s%> unto the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
And at evening <S%H6153><s%> let them return <S%H7725><s%>; and let them make a noise <S%H1993><s%> like a dog <S%H3611><s%>, and go round about <S%H5437><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>.
Let them wander up and down <S%H5128><s%> for food <S%H398><s%>, and grudge <S%H3885><s%> if they be not satisfied <S%H7646><s%>.

But I will sing <S%H7891><s%> of your power <S%H5797><s%>; Yes <S%H7442><s%>, I will sing aloud of your mercy <S%H2617><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>: for you have been my defense <S%H4869><s%> and refuge <S%H4498><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of my trouble <S%H6862><s%>.
Unto you <S%H5797><s%>, O my strength, will I sing <S%H2167><s%>: for God <S%H430><s%> is my defense <S%H4869><s%>, and the God <S%H430><s%> of my mercy <S%H2617><s%>.
